snippet.title: Payday 2 VR – Gameplay Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
PAYDAY is coming to VR - so now you can become a true heister and immerse yourself as a fully fledged bank robber.

Subscribe to GameSpot! http://youtube.com/GameSpot?sub_confirmation=1
